name: Planet of the Plants
description:
It's Trees vs. Factories in this mini world simulator! Get Ready, Get Set, Grow! Surround the rising manufacturing plants with woodlands and pull the buildings back below the earth with your mighty roots. Cover the globe in forest!

CONTROLS
Left Click to Plant Tree
Right Click to Tilt View
Escape to Pause

HOW TO PLAY
Click to plant trees near other trees and expand your forest. Seeds cannot travel far, you'll have to click pretty close to an existing tree. Surround emerging buildings to pull them back down below the ground with your root network. Seeds replenish over time.

This game was produced during the Global Game Jam 2023, under the theme of "Roots". All models and code were created during the jam period.
